AntiCorruptionInitSum.name: AntiCorruptionInitSum
AntiCorruptionInitSum.description: Represents information about the initiatives taken by an organization to communicate and train the employee on anti-corruption policies and procedures.

Country.description: Specifies the country where anti-corruption initiatives are applicable.

Description.description: The description of the anti-corruption initiative statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the anti-corruption initiative statistics are generated.

EmployeeType.description: Specifies the type of employees who participate in the anti-corruption initiative.

InitiativeType.description: Specifies the type of initiative taken to educate the participants about the anti-corruption policies and procedures.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RecipientCategory.description: Specifies the category of members who participate in the anti-corruption initiatives.

RecipientCount.description: The total number of participants in the anti-corruption initiative based on the country or region.

RecipientPercentage.description: The percentage of participants in the anti-corruption initiative based on the country or region.

Region.description: Specifies the region where anti-corruption initiatives are applicable.
